basics.name: Frank Aldape Guzmán
basics.label: Software Engineer | Frontend & Full-Stack Developer focused on quality, scalability, and user experience

summary.paragraph: I am a passionate developer focused on building modern, fluid, and scalable applications that improve users' lives. I specialize in frontend and full-stack development, applying best practices to deliver clean, efficient, and sustainable solutions.

I've worked with multidisciplinary teams in sectors such as fintech, telecommunications, and digital banking—combining software architecture, technical leadership, and agile project management to maximize product impact.
I'm motivated by continuous learning and the adoption of new technologies to streamline processes, enhance performance, and bring value both technically and strategically.

work.name: SOLPRO
work.summary: Responsible for the development and optimization of frontend applications. Designed scalable architectures, enforced coding standards, and implemented best practices across the technical team.

work.name: Millicom (Tigo)
work.summary: Developed mobile solutions using Flutter and Dart, integrated REST APIs and serverless functions using Python and AWS Lambda, and optimized performance across production applications.

work.name: Grupo Financiero Banorte
work.summary: Led technology projects for digital banking products. Implemented new technologies and data-driven approaches to enhance strategic decision-making.

work.name: Freelance Professional
work.summary: Designed modern interfaces using React and Angular. Built robust APIs with Node.js and TypeScript, and developed mobile apps using React Native.

work.name: AlphaCredit Capital
work.summary: Worked on application development using Angular and Node.js, and mobile solutions with Kotlin and Java. Integrated multiple APIs to improve system interoperability.

work.name: Apoyo Promotora
work.summary: Led the technical support area, improving operational efficiency and customer satisfaction. Implemented software solutions to automate internal processes.

education.area: Master's in Business Administration with a specialization in Finance

projects.name: Kaching App
projects.description: A mobile app built for Apoyo Soluciones clients, enabling users to manage their loans, make payments, and stay updated with their financial activities in real time.
highlights: Developed with React Native for cross-platform performance
Integrated secure authentication and user sessions
Published on Play Store and Google Play
